author: section999
message:
fix(curriculum): capitalize "what" in learn-how-to-use-conditionals (#64458)

Co-authored-by: Huyen Nguyen <25715018+huyenltnguyen@users.noreply.github.com>

files.patch:
@@ -38,7 +38,7 @@ These three words indicate something is unnecessary. Bob is saying that automati
 
 The sentence uses a `First Conditional` structure:
 
-The condition: `If we automate it` - what needs to happen.
+The condition: `If we automate it` - What needs to happen.
 
 The result: `we don't have to worry about people forgetting` - The benefit of automating.
